title: Gold 2, I have no frame, I got skin, why?

replies.body: You get the skin for being gold, your border is only in specfic queues.  Flex queue takes the Team 5v5's borders and solo takes Ranked dynamic queue
*Ghiggs Boson* mentioned some great info here. Are you not seeing the gold border in all queues, or is it just in a specific ranked queue?
